notes: They spawn during the third mission of a quest and can (or could) be killed from outside the square.
sounds: It's quite dark in the forest, isn't it?
What was that sound... hello? Is anyone there?
history: This creature was meant to be added to the [[Bestiary]] with the [[Updates/11.80|Summer Update 2018]]. Due to negative player feedback during the Test Server, this didn't come to pass.
name: Travelling Merchant
location: It can be found in [[Outlaw Camp]] during [[Rottin Wood and the Married Men Quest]].
strategy: You must find the right spot to shoot over the barrier.
